result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Pro Se Bail Motion, filed by SPD

3:30 PM Defendant Michael M Clark in court, in custody.  Prosecuting attorney Robin W Lee in court for the State of Wisconsin. Court explained the process to the defn. Defn applied for SPD and qualified. Court found good cause to waive the time limits and set case for STC. Defn orally moved to amend bond. Court advised a written mtn must be filed. 
Status conference scheduled for November 16, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Status conference on November 16, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Prior: 615 E Washington Ave, Madison, WI 53703

- Defendant shall not use/possess controlled substances or drug paraphernalia without a valid prescription. 
- Defendant shall not have any contact, direct or indirect, with RG or KES. 
Parties did not stipulate to waive the time limits for Preliminary Hearing.
Trial Judge - Br 14

1:54 PM Defendant Michael M Clark in court, in custody.  Attorney Laura Breun in court for Michael M Clark.  Prosecuting attorney Kyle Olsen in court for the State of Wisconsin. The defendant was advised regarding their right to an attorney and to the SPD application process if not already represented. Defendant received a copy of the Complaint and waived reading. Court entered Not Guilty pleas as to any misdemeanor counts. Brief adjournment. 2:19 PM Case re-called. Further arguments by parties.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for October 26, 2022 at 03:00 pm.
Preliminary hearing on October 26, 2022 at 03:00 pm.

Cash Bond Set - $1,000.00
- Defendant shall not use/possess controlled substances or drug paraphernalia without a valid prescription. 
- Defendant shall not have any contact, direct or indirect, with RG or KES.
Bail/bond hearing on October 31, 2022 at 08:30 am.
